pr_title: Overview Hangar Report: Completely reworked Hangar Report

timeline.message: 219: Added Support Vehicles to Hangar, Part 1 of Refactoring
Further Refactoring, adding Rail, Maglev, Satellites, and enabling Fixed-Wing

timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText:
Welp, this one is embarrassing... I pride myself on spelling things correctly 😂
It has been fixed, and not through github cause I don't trust how the numbering looks (probably just found a bug on Github 😂)
